channel.title: The WildeBeat
channel.description: "The audio journal about getting into the wilderness." For 10 minutes each week, we help you explore and appreciate America's wilderness. Listen to The Wildebeat to explore new places, learn safe and responsible skills, and prepare to get into the wilderness! You don't need to do extreme sports to enjoy nature and being outdoors; anyone can enjoy backcountry activities, such as camping, hiking, backpacking, horseback riding, rafting, kayaking, canoeing, climbing, mountaineering, skiing, or snowshoeing. We're a non-profit, listener-supported educational service of Earth Island Institute. (For a complete audio archive, please visit our web site: www.wildebeat.net.)
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-No Derivative Works 3.0 License.

item.itunes:keywords: wilderness, outdoor, hiking, camping, backpacking, horseback riding, rafting, kayaking, canoeing, climbing, skiing, snowshoeing

item.title: Announcement: A New Show
item.itunes:subtitle: Announcing our change in format.
item.description:
This is a special announcement in place of our regular show.

Steve announces a change in our format and our production schedule. Our future programs will be presented in a longer format on roughly a monthly schedule. We expect to release the first in our new series of programs in December.

  • Special Announcement on November 6, 2008 [MP3 format; length 6:32; 3,133,896 bytes]

JOIN NOW -- Help us help more folks to appreciate our wild public lands.
item.itunes:summary:
This is a special announcement in place of our regular show.

Steve announces a change in our format and our production schedule. Our future programs will be presented in a longer format on roughly a monthly schedule. We expect to release the first in our new series of programs in December.

  • Special Announcement on November 6, 2008 [MP3 format; length 6:32; 3,133,896 bytes]

For a complete audio archive, and to find out more, visit: www.wildebeat.net
